crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET USER_AGENTS Microsoft Office Existence Discovery User-Agent
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET USER_AGENTS Microsoft Office Existence Discovery User-Agent"; flow:established,to_server; http.user_agent; content:"Microsoft Office Existence Discovery"; bsize:36; threshold:type both, track by_src, count 1, seconds 600; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2041131; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2022_11_30, deployment Perimeter, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2022_11_30;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA STREAM TIMEWAIT ACK with wrong seq
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA STREAM TIMEWAIT ACK with wrong seq"; stream-event:timewait_ack_wrong_seq; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2210042; rev:2;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA HTTP Request unrecognized authorization method
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA HTTP Request unrecognized authorization method"; flow:established,to_server; app-layer-event:http.request_auth_unrecognized; flowint:http.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2221034; rev:1;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: TGI HUNT Unencrypted HTTP Authorization Header Outbound
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"TGI HUNT Unencrypted HTTP Authorization Header Outbound"; flow:established,to_server; http.header; content:"Authorization|3a 20|Bearer"; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2610608; rev:1;)

trid.file_type: Word Microsoft Office Open XML Format document

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factors were that it has known exploits and it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Use Short Name Path in Command Line
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid command-line detection

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level - PowerShell
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects use of Set-ExecutionPolicy to set insecure policies

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Use Short Name Path in Image
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid Image detection

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects XML relations where an OLE object is refrencing an external target in dropper OOXML documents
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: ditekSHen

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Detects a suspicious pattern in docx document.xml.rels file as seen in CVE-2022-30190 / Follina exploitation
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Tobias Michalski, Christian Burkard, Wojciech Cieslak

crowdsourced_ai_results.analysis: This indicator has been related to campaigns that use phishing emails to deliver malware that is executed via PowerShell.
